Title: Doug's Home Page
Body: If you're in the Boston area, you might want to come to one of several seminars that are held at Northeastern (in room 107 of Cullinane Hall ): Programming Language Semantics , Wednesdays 9:30am-11:30am Cryptography , Thursdays 10:00am-11:45am Demeter , Fridays 10:00am-12noon Distributed Systems , Fridays 1:00pm-2:30pm I used to work at Pure Software .
